param.name: zoomenu
param.label: Menu
param.description: If you select only one root menu item only its childrens will be shown. On multiple selection, the selected will be on the first level.

param.name: rootasitem
param.label: Singe root as menuitem
param.description: If enabled and one selected in the previous option, the behaviour will be the same as multiple selection.

param.name: displaynum
param.label: Display number of items
param.description: Display the item count for a parent item

param.name: menuicons
param.label: Menu icons
param.description: If enabled, the menu will add the specified image from the menu item.
